title: Metis installation error with spack ... ld: warning: libimf.so, needed by ../libmetis/libmetis.so, not found ...
body:
I want to install maphys hybrid solver using spack with intel compiler ,intelmpi and MKL using this command:

`spack install -j 4 -v --keep-stage  maphys%intel@17.0.0+blasmt+mumps ^mumps@5.0.1 ^mkl-scalapack ^mkl@exist ^hwloc@exist ^intelmpi@exist`
